result.markdown: --- title: "Publications" sidebar: false page-layout: article toc: false title-block-banner: true editor: markdown: wrap: sentence --- This page lists the academic publications and presentations resulting from ClimateSense. ::: {.cell} ::: [Burel, G. and H. Alani](#cite-Burel2025ClimaFactsKG) (2025). "ClimaFactsKG: Towards an Interlinked Knowledge Graph of Scientific Evidence to Fight Climate Misinformation". In: _Proceedings of the 5th International Workshop on Scientific Knowledge: Representation, Discovery, and Assessment co-located with 24th International Semantic Web Conference (ISWC 2025)_. Nara, Japan. [Burel, G., P. Lisena, E. Daga, et al.](#cite-Burel2025ClimateSense) (2025). "ClimateSense at CheckThat! 2025: Combining Fine-tuned Large Language Models and Conventional Machine Learning Models for Subjectivity and Scientific Web Discourse". In: _CheckThat! 2025: Subjectivity, Fact-Checking, Claim Normalization, and Retrieval_.
